data.title: Naively parse a text removing stopwords
data.meta_description: Naively parse a text removing stopwords. GitHub Gist: instantly share code, notes, and snippets.
data.text: $text = "Requirements - Working knowledge, on LAMP Environment using Linux, Apache 2, MySQL 5 and PHP 5, - Knowledge of Web 2.0 Standards - Comfortable with JSON - Hands on Experience on working with Frameworks, Zend, OOPs - Cross Browser Javascripting, JQuery etc. - Knowledge of Version Control Software such as sub-version will be preferable.";
